TEXT.TITLE: TURKISH CENTRAL BANK SETS LIRA/DOLLAR, DM RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Turkish Central Bank set a Lira/Dollar rate for March 10 of 773.05/776.92 to the Dollar, down from the previous 769.60/773.45. The Bank also set a Lira/Mark rate of 417.20/419.29 to the Mark, up from the previous 419.15/421.25.
